actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to promote and accelerate the development and use of a new generation of quieter commercial jet aircraft, and for other purposes.
short_title: Aircraft Noise Reduction Research Act of 1992

summary.text: Aircraft Noise Reduction Research Act of 1992 - Directs the Administrators of the Federal Aviation Administration and of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to establish and jointly conduct a research program to develop by the year 2000 new technologies, operational procedures, or other means for quieter subsonic jet aircraft engines and airframes. Authorizes appropriations. Requires an annual progress report to the Congress.

titles.title: Aircraft Noise Reduction Research Act of 1992
A bill to promote and accelerate the development and use of a new generation of quieter commercial jet aircraft, and for other purposes.
